The '''Wall of Samiel''', or simply referred to as the '''Wall''', is the wall separating [[Dharma Forest]] and the [[Great Red Sand]] in [[Sumeru]].

It was supposedly made by [[Greater Lord Rukkhadevata]] to prevent sandstorms from ruining the Sumeru rainforests.

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{Lang|Samiel|tr=samyeli|tr_tl=poison wind}} is another name for {{W|simoom}}; a strong, dry, dust-laden wind that blows in the Sahara and Arabian deserts.
